article_title: SNL shows Marvel how to write a Black Widow movie-as a romcom
article_text:
“Does Marvel not know how to make a girl superhero movie?” No way! “Marvel gets women.”

SNL poked fun at Marvel’s superhero “sexism,” dreaming up the kind of movie they might write for Black Widow—a superhero romcom, where Black Widow works at a fashion rag and falls in love with Ultron.

Things quickly get off to a rocky start between them, however—as you might imagine.

Watch below:
